title: When bad typesetting attacks!
content:
Right now I am reading a book with type set entirely in Arial with negative tracking.

It’s not fun.
author: James Puckett

comments.content:
Oh how bitter!  
I assure you that my math syllabus compares. Justified 12pt text in a 12 pica wide column... more rivers than the Nile delta.

Still, how would we know the sweet, without the bitter?

evan  
 [www.evanmade.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907074656/http:/evanmade.com/)
James, it’s not “I hope they serve beer in hell.” by Tucker Max by any chance?

The question is, _Why_ are you reading this book set in Arial with negative tracking?
